mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT authority.`code` FROM authority LEFT JOIN role_authority ON authority.id = role_authority.authority_id LEFT JOIN role ON role_authority.role_id = role.id LEFT JOIN user_role ON role.id = user_role.role_id WHERE role.is_enable = 1 AND role.is_deleted = 'N' AND user_role.is_deleted = 'N' AND role_authority.is_deleted = 'N' and authority.is_deleted = 'N' AND user_role.user_id = #{loginId} and authority.is_enable = 1 AND authority.`code` != '' AND authority.`code` IS NOT NULL

SELECT DISTINCT authority.* FROM authority LEFT JOIN role_authority ON authority.id = role_authority.authority_id LEFT JOIN role ON role_authority.role_id = role.id LEFT JOIN user_role ON role.id = user_role.role_id WHERE role.is_enable = 1 AND role.is_deleted = 'N' AND user_role.is_deleted = 'N' AND role_authority.is_deleted = 'N' AND authority.is_deleted = 'N' AND user_role.user_id = #{userId} AND authority.is_enable = 1 ORDER BY authority.sort, authority.create_time

SELECT DISTINCT authority.* FROM authority LEFT JOIN role_authority ra ON authority.id = authority_id AND ra.is_deleted = 0 WHERE authority.is_deleted = 0 AND authority.is_enable = 1 AND role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY authority.sort
